advisory.name: RLSA-2021:1846
advisory.synopsis: Moderate: idm:DL1 and idm:client security, bug fix, and enhancement update
advisory.topic:
An update for the idm:DL1 and idm:client modules is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisory.description:
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Identity Management (IdM) is a centralized authentication, identity management, and authorization solution for both traditional and cloud-based enterprise environments. 
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: [RFE] Implement pam_pwquality featureset in IPA password policies
ipa command provides stack trace when provided with single hypen commands
[RFE]: Able to browse different links from IPA web gui in new tabs
Incorrect certs are being updated with "ipa-certupdate"
ipa-client-install changes system wide ssh configuration
kinit is failing due to overflow in Root CA certificate's timestamp
ipa-cert-fix warning message should use commercial name for the product.
ipa-healthcheck - Mention that the default output format is JSON.
Source 'ipahealthcheck.ipa.topology' not found is displayed when ipactl service is stopped
ipa-cert-fix tool fails when the Dogtag CA SSL CSR is missing from CS.cfg
Unlock user accounts after a password reset and replicate that unlock to all IdM servers
Man page has incorrect examples; log location for healthcheck tool
ipa-server-certinstall raises exception when installing IPA-issued web server cert
Intermittent IdM Client Registration Failures
Add Directory Server Healthchecks from lib389
CVE-2020-11023 jquery: Passing HTML containing <option> elements to manipulation methods could result in untrusted code execution
[RFE] IdM short-term certificates ACME provider
negative option for token.mechanism not working correctly
ipa trust-add fails when FIPS enabled
ipa-healthcheck --input-file returns 1 on exit

It is not possible to edit KDC database when the FreeIPA server is running

ipa-kdb: support subordinate/superior UPN suffixes
ipa-healthcheck returns msg": "{sssctl} {key} reports mismatch: sssd domains {sssd_domains} trust domains {trust_domains}"

Fix upstream test test_smb.py::TestSMB::test_authentication_with_smb_cifs_principal_alias
